text: Fantana may refer to: Places in Romania: see Fântâna (disambiguation) Other uses: * USS Fantana (SP-71), a United States Navy patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1919 * Fantanas, a group of spokesmodels for Fanta * Fantana (musical), a 1905 musical by John Raymond Hubbell * Brian Fantana, a character in the comedy films Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy and Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues, played by Paul Rudd
title: Fantana
